description:
Organisations have bought third party software for decades, preferring the outsourcing of such so-called commodities to building them in-house.

Is that still the right approach, was it ever the right approach and do we need to try something new?

And what does a chicken salad sandwich have to do with it?

Important questions that will be addressed in this talk.

SPEAKER: Reda Hmeid. Technical Architect, Equal Expert
title: Custom built software is not like making a chicken salad sandwich from scratch
